revision.text:
[[Category:ReadyMadeJobs]][[Category:JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve]][[Category:Scheduling]]
===Description of JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve - Launch and observe any given job or job chain===
This job is doing a check wether a job with a given job_name ist running.
An example for a job-xml file:
<job order='no' > <params> </params> <script language="java" java_class="sos.scheduler.job.JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve" /> </job>
===Parameter used by JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve===
{| border="1" |+ List of parameter ! ! Name || title || mandatory || default |}
===Return parameter JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve===
The order parameter described below are returned by the job to the JobScheduler. JobSchedulerLaunchAndObserve
{| border="1" |+ List of parameter ! ! Name || title || mandatory || default |}
